patthana1.12:8.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:8.2: sekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.12:9.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:10.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:10.2: sekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3
patthana1.12:11.1: Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:11.2: asekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.12:12.1: Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:13.1: Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā … pe …
patthana1.12:13.3: asekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana1.12:14.2: nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.12:14.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā … pe …
patthana1.12:14.10: dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā, mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. #1

patthana1.12:15.2: sekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1

patthana1.12:16.2: asekkhe khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #1

patthana1.12:18.11: sekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe ….

patthana1.12:19.2: nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …

patthana1.12:21.2: vipākaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.12:21.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …. #1

patthana1.12:33.2: ahetukaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.12:33.8: khandhe paṭicca vatthu, vatthuṃ paṭicca khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana1.12:33.15: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1

patthana1.12:37.2: nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ … pe …

patthana1.12:45.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti naāsevanapaccayā—
patthana1.12:45.2: vipākaṃ sekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #3

patthana1.12:65.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:69.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme dve, navipāke pañca, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:73.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.12:81.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.12:82.1: Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana1.12:83.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā (paripuṇṇaṃ), mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā. #1
patthana1.12:84.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:85.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:86.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:86.2: vatthuṃ paccayā sekkhā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #4

patthana1.12:87.2: vatthuṃ paccayā asekkhā khandhā, mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. #5

patthana1.12:88.2: sekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhā. #1

patthana1.12:131.1: Sekkhañca nevasekkhanāsekkhañca dhammaṃ paccayā sekkho dhammo uppajjati navipākapaccayā.
patthana1.12:133.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naāhārapaccayā …
patthana1.12:136.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, naāhāre ekaṃ, naindriye ekaṃ, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:140.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa, naāsevane sattarasa, nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā pañca, novigate pañca.
patthana1.12:143.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.12:151.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:151.2: sekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.12:152.1: Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho asekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:152.2: asekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …. #1
patthana1.12:153.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:153.2: nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.12:155.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.12:158.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana1.12:162.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana1.12:162.2: ahetukaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā … pe … dve khandhe … pe …
patthana1.12:162.8: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe saṃsaṭṭho vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana1.12:164.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.12:165.1: Asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho asekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā—
patthana1.12:166.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayā.
patthana1.12:168.1: Sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sekkho dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā …
patthana1.12:171.1: Nahetuyā ekaṃ, naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte tīṇi, naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, najhāne ekaṃ, namagge ekaṃ, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.12:174.1: Hetupaccayā naadhipatiyā tīṇi, napurejāte tīṇi, napacchājāte naāsevane tīṇi, nakamme dve, navipāke dve, navippayutte tīṇi.
patthana1.12:177.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe ekaṃ, anantare samanantare sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye upanissaye purejāte āsevane kamme vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṃ.
patthana1.12:185.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:185.2: sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:186.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:186.2: sekkhā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:187.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:187.2: sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:189.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:189.2: nevasekkhanāsekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:191.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:191.2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ paccavekkhanti, sekkhaṃ phalaṃ paccavekkhanti, cetopariyañāṇena sekkhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānanti, sekkhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:192.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:192.2: arahā asekkhaṃ phalaṃ paccavekkhati, cetopariyañāṇena asekkhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, asekkhā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:193.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:193.2: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni … pe …
patthana1.12:193.4: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ paccavekkhati, ariyā nibbānaṃ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.12:193.5: Nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:193.6: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti, cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti abhinandanti, taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe …
patthana1.12:193.10: vatthuṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, assādenti … pe …
patthana1.12:193.12: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevasekkhanāsekkhacittasamaṅgissa cittaṃ jānāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanassa … pe …
patthana1.12:193.19: nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṃsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:194.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:194.2: nibbānaṃ maggassa, sekkhassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:195.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:197.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:198.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:198.4: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, sekkhaṃ phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.12:199.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:199.3: sekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:200.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:201.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:201.4: arahā asekkhaṃ phalaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati.
patthana1.12:202.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:202.3: asekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:203.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:203.4: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati, ariyā nibbānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhanti, nibbānaṃ gotrabhussa, vodānassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:203.5: Cakkhuṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.12:203.8: vatthuṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṃ garuṃ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.12:203.10: nevasekkhanāsekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:204.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:204.3: nibbānaṃ maggassa, sekkhassa phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:205.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:207.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:207.2: purimā purimā sekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ sekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:207.4: sekkhaṃ phalaṃ sekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:208.1: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:209.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:210.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:210.2: purimā purimā asekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ asekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:210.3: Asekkhaṃ phalaṃ asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:211.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:212.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:212.2: purimā purimā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana1.12:213.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:213.5: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalaṃ sekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:214.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:214.3: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyaṃ asekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:216.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.12:218.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.12:218.4: (Paṭiccavāre aññamaññasadisaṃ, tīṇi. Nissayapaccaye kusalattike nissayapaccayasadisaṃ, terasa pañhā.)
patthana1.12:220.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:220.5: paṭhamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:220.6: Dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:220.7: Tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:221.1: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:222.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:222.5: ariyā maggaṃ upanissāya anuppannaṃ kusalasamāpattiṃ uppādenti, uppannaṃ samāpajjanti, saṅkhāre aniccato … pe …
patthana1.12:222.11: Sekkhā phalasamāpatti kāyikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:223.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:223.3: purimā purimā asekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ asekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana1.12:223.5: asekkhaṃ phalaṃ asekkhassa phalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:224.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:224.5: asekkhā phalasamāpatti kāyikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:225.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:225.16: samāpattiṃ uppādeti, mānaṃ jappeti, diṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.12:225.27: senāsanaṃ upanissāya dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ … pe …
patthana1.12:225.42: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:225.43: Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.12:225.47: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.12:226.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:226.5: paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana1.12:226.7: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṃ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:227.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:229.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:229.4: cakkhuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, assādeti abhinandati;
patthana1.12:229.7: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.12:229.12: vatthuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati … pe …
patthana1.12:229.14: domanassaṃ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.12:229.20: kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ purejātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:230.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:231.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:233.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:233.2: pacchājātā sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:234.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:234.2: pacchājātā asekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:235.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:235.2: pacchājātā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:237.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:237.2: purimā purimā nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:238.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:240.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:240.4: sekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:240.6: sekkhā cetanā vipākānaṃ sekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:241.1: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:241.3: sekkhā cetanā asekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:242.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:242.3: sekkhā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:243.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:243.2: sekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.12:244.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:244.2: asekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:245.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:245.2: asekkhā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:246.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:246.2: asekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:247.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:247.4: nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:247.8: nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā vipākānaṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:249.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:249.2: vipāko sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.12:250.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:250.2: asekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe ….
patthana1.12:251.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:251.2: vipāko nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …
patthana1.12:253.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo … jhānapaccayena paccayo … maggapaccayena paccayo … sampayuttapaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.12:255.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:255.4: sekkhā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:255.6: sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:256.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:257.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:257.4: nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:257.5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:257.11: kāyāyatanaṃ kāyaviññāṇassa, vatthu nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṃ khandhānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:257.13: nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:258.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:259.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:261.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:261.2: sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ … pe …. #1
patthana1.12:262.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:262.4: sekkhā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:262.6: sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:263.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:263.2: sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …. #3
patthana1.12:264.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … tīṇi.
patthana1.12:265.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:265.4: nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …
patthana1.12:265.11: Vatthu khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ … pe …
patthana1.12:265.20: taṃ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati … pe … domanassaṃ uppajjati.
patthana1.12:265.25: vatthuṃ aniccato … pe … vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa … pe …
patthana1.12:265.36: nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:266.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:267.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:268.1: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:268.4: sekkho eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṃ khandhānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo … pe … dve khandhā … pe …. #1
patthana1.12:269.1: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—
patthana1.12:269.4: sekkhā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:269.6: sekkhā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:269.8: sekkhā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṃ atthipaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:270.1: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana1.12:273.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha, samanantare aṭṭha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā aṭṭha, vigate aṭṭha, avigate terasa.
patthana1.12:276.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:277.1: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:278.1: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:279.1: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #4
patthana1.12:280.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:281.1: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:282.1: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:283.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo … pacchājātapaccayena paccayo … kammapaccayena paccayo … āhārapaccayena paccayo … indriyapaccayena paccayo. #1
patthana1.12:284.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #2
patthana1.12:285.1: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo. #3
patthana1.12:286.1: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.12:287.1: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.12:288.1: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, purejātaṃ. #1
patthana1.12:289.1: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṃ, pacchājātaṃ, āhāraṃ, indriyaṃ. #2
patthana1.12:293.1: Nahetuyā cuddasa, naārammaṇe naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare cuddasa, nasahajāte dasa, naaññamaññe dasa, nanissaye dasa, naupanissaye terasa, napurejāte dvādasa, napacchājāte cuddasa, naāsevane nakamme cuddasa, navipāke dvādasa, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge cuddasa, nasampayutte dasa, navippayutte aṭṭha, noatthiyā aṭṭha, nonatthiyā cuddasa, novigate cuddasa, noavigate aṭṭha.
patthana1.12:297.1: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme satta, navipāke cattāri, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge satta, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte tīṇi, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
patthana1.12:301.1: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā nava, anantare aṭṭha, samanantare aṭṭha, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye aṭṭha, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane dve, kamme aṭṭha, vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā terasa, natthiyā aṭṭha, vigate aṭṭha, avigate terasa.
